related_questions.question:
Quiz ;)    Aldo left his favourite restaurant at 11 o’clock. It was warm evening and decided to walk along the beach. Suddenly, four masked girls aged about seventeen came up to …………… and asked for the street.

A. Him
B. Her
C. You
D. Me​

answers.answer:
➡️ A Him

Question

Aldo left his favourite restaurant at 11 o’clock. It was warm evening and decided to walk along the beach. Suddenly, four masked girls aged about seventeen came up to ……and asked for the street.

A. Him

B. Her

C. You

D. Me

Translat

Aldo meninggalkan restoran favoritnya pada pukul 11. Itu adalah malam yang hangat dan memutuskan untuk berjalan di sepanjang pantai. Tiba-tiba, empat gadis bertopeng berusia sekitar tujuh belas datang ke …………… dan meminta jalan.

A. Dia

B. Dia

C. Anda

D. Saya

Answer

A. Him

Explanation

Explain as a pronoun he is male is him, he, .

while the pronoun in female her, she,

6.A curly eyelashes

7.C they have black and white stripes on their bodies

8.C. happy

9.C. at the kitchen

10. C globe and air conditioner

11. B. There are eight classroom (sebenernya soalnya agak gajelas karena tidak menunjukan angka/jumlah kelas di sekolahnya)

12. C. No, I don't

13. B. Television

14. C. No, I don't

15. C. Stove

related_questions.question:
Monkey and crocodile    one day a monkey wanted to cross a river. he saw a crocodile in the river, so he asked the crocodile to take him across the other side. the crocodile told the monkey to jump on its back. then the crocodile swam down the river.
now, the crocodile was very hungry, so when it was in the middle of the river, it stopped and said to the monkey, "monkey, my father is very sick. he must eat the heart of the monkey. then he will be strong again."
the monkey thought for a while. then he told the crocodile to swim back to the river bank.
"what’s for?" asked the crocodile.
"because i didn’t bring my heart with me," said the monkey. "i left it under the tree, near some coconuts."
so, the crocodile turned around and swam back to the bank of the river. as soon as they reached the river bank, the monkey jumped off the crocodile’s back and climbed up to the top of a tree.
"where is your heart?" asked the crocodile.

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

suatu hari monyet ingin menyeberangi sungai. dia melihat buaya di sungai, jadi dia meminta buaya untuk membawanya ke seberang. buaya menyuruh monyet untuk melompat di atasnya

3. What is the purpose of retelling a narrative, please explain?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

The importance of retelling stories is that it allows students to learn to organize and describe events, which enhances reading comprehension.
